name: Project Echo (rende36)
description: This game was made for Trijam #59. I finished it with about 5 minutes to spare. The controls are standard first person (wasd and mouse with tab to use your echolocation) and I didn't have to make a pause menu so you'll have to die or win if you want to quit. Tho only thing that wasn't made during the three hours was the outline shader, I made it a little while ago following this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cQw1CL0xYBE. Everything else was made in the three hours.
